Html:
So finally we reveal what we have been working on :

It's a space simulator where you build the ships - stations - cities with cubes, and you can get out of the ship to shoot some aliens and grab the loot - FPS style.

http://www.indiegogo.com/projects/xeno-galaxies

https://www.facebook.com/xenogalaxies

http://www.youtube.com/user/XenoGalaxies

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=137011553

http://www.xenogalaxies.com/

I think we re due to update the techcraft opensource project now, at least giving you a working multithread terrain with streaming :)
